name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 28, according to the Hebei Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision, Hao Zhijun, deputy mayor of Tangshan City, Hebei Province, was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law. 

According to the information disclosed on the website of the Hebei Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision, the seven provincial officials investigated since April 5 this year are all related to Tangshan

On April 5, Li Jianzhong, deputy mayor of Tangshan City, was investigated

On April 9, Li Guifu, deputy director of the Standing Committee of the Tangshan Municipal People's Congress and secretary of the Qianxi County Party Committee, was investigated

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 29, police and plainclothes officers were seen everywhere near the Suzhou Japanese School.
At the Sun Hung Kai Center North Bus Stop, a bunch of flowers fell to the ground alone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One person doing good can inspire thousands of people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 27, Guangdong. A man posted a video saying that his family transferred 10,000 yuan to another account with the same name, but the police came to investigate on the grounds of anti-fraud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 29, water situation in Zunyi, Guizhou.
The owner of a billiard hall near Zunyi Garden said that "the water suddenly flooded so deep in one hour" and the billiard hall equipment in the storeroom was soaked, resulting in a loss of nearly hundreds of thousands of yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 29 (Released) Guangzhou, Guangdong. One month after Sanyuanli Village banned electric bikes, some netizens found that managers wearing red vests were allowed to ride electric bikes in the village. Netizens said that it usually takes only one minute to send a parcel by bike, but now it takes ten minutes to walk back and forth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 28, in Zhumadian, Henan, a man posted a video saying that the cafeteria of Zhumadian Yangzhuang Senior High School was divided into male and female dining areas, and there was not a single stool in the entire cafeteria, and everyone ate standing up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 28, in Nantong, Jiangsu, a netizen posted a video saying that two ships collided and sank on the river surface of Binjiang Park.
Official report: The "Quanqiang 528" ship collided with the cargo ship "Qingfeng 98", causing the "Qingfeng 98" ship to sink. All 6 people on board fell into the water, of which 4 were rescued and 2 were missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 29, in Lanzhou, Gansu, a delivery man had an argument with the security guard of the Asia-Pacific Oriental Constellation Community, and the security guard approached him with an electric baton.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 28, Chengdu, Sichuan. Netizens posted a video saying that a van in Longquanyi District hit an electric bike while reversing. The female friend of the perpetrator came over and danced arrogantly. The woman threatened: Don’t touch the porcelain, I have the director’s phone number!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, netizens flocked to the comment section of the Chengdu Public Security Bureau account to leave messages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 29 (Released) Tongren, Guizhou. It was reported online that someone had died in Dejiang County, Guizhou, and all the staff of Dejiang No. 1 Middle School and the Health Center were arranged to stand vigil. 
The staff of the Dejiang County Education Bureau said that they had called their principal and were handling the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 28, Changzhi, Shanxi. A netizen posted a video saying that his intellectually disabled uncle inexplicably took out a loan of 113,000 yuan two years ago. After checking, it was found that someone used the uncle's identity information to borrow money to buy a car.
Netizens questioned why the bank did not review the uncle's poor financial conditions and was penniless, and gave a loan to a mentally disabled person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 29 (Released) Baoding, Hebei.
A surveillance video was circulated on the Internet. The surveillance video showed that on the afternoon of June 27, a man in black was riding his bicycle home when a black car behind him accelerated and hit him.
